Description:
Detects execution of the "mount" command with "hidepid" parameter to make invisible processes to other users from the system

Author: Joseliyo Sanchez, @Joseliyo_Jstnk
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Mount Execution With Hidepid Parameter
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%/mount' and (command like '%hidepid=2%' and command like '% -o %')
